movies.title: Oppenheimer
movies.synopsis: The story of J. Robert Oppenheimer, the physicist behind the atomic bomb.

movies.title: Barbie
movies.synopsis: Barbie embarks on an adventure to the real world after being expelled from Barbieland.

movies.title: Aquaman: King of Atlantis
movies.synopsis: Alongside trusted allies Mera and Vulko, King Aquaman faces unscrupulous surface dwellers, ancient evils from beyond time, and his half-brother's attempts to overthrow him all to prove that he's the right man for the throne!

movies.title: Creed III
movies.synopsis: Adonis has been thriving in both his career and family life, but when a childhood friend and former boxing prodigy resurfaces, the face-off is more than just a fight

movies.title: Inception
movies.synopsis: A thief who enters dreams to steal secrets from deep within the subconscious.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.synopsis: Batman battles the Joker, a criminal mastermind who wants to bring chaos to Gotham City.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.synopsis: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.synopsis: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

movies.title: Avengers: Endgame
movies.synopsis: The Avengers assemble once more to undo the catastrophic damage caused by Thanos.

movies.title: Black Panther
movies.synopsis: T'Challa returns home to Wakanda to assume his place as king but faces challenges from enemies.

movies.title: Dune
movies.synopsis: A noble family becomes embroiled in a war for control over the desert planet Arrakis.

movies.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
movies.synopsis: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior.

movies.title: Avatar: The Way of Water
movies.synopsis: Jake Sully and Neytiri must protect their family as a new threat emerges on Pandora.

movies.synopsis: Doctor Strange explores the Multiverse to confront a new, powerful adversary.

movies.title: Deadpool 3
movies.synopsis: The Merc with a Mouth returns in this highly anticipated sequel, teaming up with Wolverine for a multiverse adventure.

movies.synopsis: The next chapter in the Planet of the Apes saga, exploring the rise of a new ape civilization.

movies.title: Gladiator 2
movies.synopsis: The sequel to the epic historical drama, following the legacy of Maximus in ancient Rome.

movies.title: Mission: Impossible 8
movies.synopsis: Ethan Hunt and his team face their most dangerous mission yet, with global stakes and personal sacrifices.

movies.title: The Marvels
